Posts.Content: I appreciated casual visits and food from my favorite restaurants. It was weird eating it for take out but kinda cool too! I also really appreciated an extra long phone cord for charging at random places like the hospital, chemo room etc. Or even a battery bank for extra juice and independence. Oh, maybe even a gift card for online music like Apple Music or Pandora! Such a nice distraction.
Posts.Title: What’s on your cancer care package wish list?
